verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a coward] . He is also a bully , which makes him vulnerable to the simplest of attacks on his presidency . You see cowards are always waiting for someone to call them on their cowardice . The Republican Party is comprised of cowards . ...
